summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

summary.span: 获取一个名称数组，其中的名称表示数据源中的已命名视图。

span.span: Gets an array of names representing named views in the data source.

returns.span: 此实现始终返回一个空字符串数组。

span.span: This implementation always returns an empty string array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此数据源设计器中未实现命名的视图。Named views are not implemented in this data source designer. 视图根据在 XPath 查询，而不是名称来检索。Views are retrieved based on an XPath query rather than name.
